Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 5
Description: Papyrus Anastasi V; sheet 5; Hieratic text. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. 12.1-13.1 Congratulations to a military officer upon promotion. 13.2-13.7 Letter about a bull. Unpublished small fragments apparently from this manuscript are now EA 76453.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies p. 62, 63; Caminos, Late Egyptian Miscellanies.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381201)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack, bleached Black ink Backed: brown paper Displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Displayed in Room 61 from 1997 to 2000 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: D Curatorial condition comment: fair
